title: Things We Lost In The Fire
body:
So you may have noticed that we’ve had a nifty little redesign with the site, that went live last night.

Whilst there’s still a few bits and pieces to sort out (images not loading correctly, player occasionally malfunctioning), we believe it’s a big step forward for the Crack in the Road. Feel free to head to the [frontpage](www.crackintheroad.com) and have a little look around, we’d love some feedback, either over on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/crackintheroad) or [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/crackintheroad).

Anyway, in the reshuffle, we lost several posts, as well as much of yesterday, so we’re playing catch-up a little. With that in mind here’s a bunch of tracks, some reposts, that we think are essential listening.
